name: SpaceCrew (HoraceRIBOUT)
description:
This game was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021, in like, two week end. 

Version of the 21th December 1AM :
- The game is not finished. It's a demo/prototype/toy. I plan to add the rest of the interaction with the crew, the ever expanded universe and some music soon or later.

Play with : 

ZQSD/AWSD : move
Mouse : aim
Mouse click : shoot/continue conversation

If you land on a planet, it will open the menu, and you will be able to upgrade the ship, but also, your relationship with the other crewmates!
